name: Wuli
description:
You need MetaMask Wallet in order to login.

Works with keyboard and game controller.

・Moving the character around
KeyBoard:
  [A] move left [D] move right [S] crouching (jump + crouching will hit the ground) [L] jump, [K] attack, [B]open/close door 
USB controller:
[left D-pad] move around , attack (no one to attack in creative mode), jump, open/close door, all will be displayed dynamically depending on the controller you are using.
The buttons/keys you need to press in order to play the game are dynamically displayed inside the game, usually at the bottom of the screen but there is few exceptions.
・Pause/multi-tab menu 
 Keyboard: : [P] Pause game, open and close your inventory
 USB controller [start] or [menu] button, depending on your current controller. ・Moving cursor around to place block
KeyBoard:[move mouse] that is, if no gamepad is plugged in

USB controller: [right joystick] will do.

・Saving your world Just open the inventory and select the tab that looks like this , then press the attack button to confirm (the exact button/key you need to press to confirm saving will be displayed at the bottom of the screen)

・Saving warning When you save, some text at the top of the screen will display the saving progress, it is not so visible sometimes (White text on bright background for example) . Make sure you keep your eyes on it, and once it disappear, it means the saving process is completed. If you decide to close the application after that, it is advisable to wait maybe at least 15 second after that to make sure the server is done processing your world data. Your world map is your asset, don't loose it!
